    com.mongodb.DBObject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, org.bson.BSONObject

    public class WikiUser
extends WikiElement
    This class is used to fetch and store the data related to an user.
    Author:
    jeremie
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • fetchInfo

        public void fetchInfo()
        Fetch the info about the user. The parameters used are: list = users; usprop = blockinfo|groups|implicitgroups|rights|registration|editcount|gender.

      • fetchList

        public void fetchList(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
        Perform a query using the specified parameters and filters the result. The parameters must contain ["action":"query"] and ["list":???].
        Parameters:
        params -

      • fetchUserContribs

        public void fetchUserContribs()
        Fetch all the contributions of the user. The parameters used are: list = usercontribs; redirects.
